history.proof: intros a b H. qsimpl use: Nlt_mult_rev_0_l. apply N.gt_lt_iff. apply N.neq_0_lt_0. qsimpl use: Nlt_mult_rev_0_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : N H : a * b > 0 Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1410) = Lt" with "(a ?= 0) = Gt".
The reference N.gt_mult_0 was not found in the current environment.

In environment H0 : forall a b : N, 0 < a * b -> 0 < a a, b : N H2 : (a * b ?= 0) = Gt Unable to unify "0 < a * b" with "a <> 0".

original: intros a b H. apply Nlt_mult_rev_0_l with (b := b). apply N.gt_mult_0. - apply N.gt_mult_0. + apply Nlt_mult_rev_0_l with (a := a * b). apply Nlt_mult_rev_0_r with (a := b). apply Nlt_mult_rev_0_l with (a := a * b). apply H. + apply Nlt_mult_rev_0_r with (a := a). apply BinNat.N.le_0_l. - apply BinNat.N.le_0_l.
